attributes.title: No way!
attributes.review: Downloaded this app only to realize how horrible it is. Days to download crashes my phone and have to keep restarting my phone to get out of endless freezing loop. Be warned this is a terrible president, I mean app.

attributes.title: delete this monstrosity now!!!! Please 🥺👉👈
attributes.review: I would like to begin this review with the statement that this app is a disappointment just like the president himself. I mean like where was the flavor there was no flavor. And the fact that it was so tiring and boring really made me want to drink bleach.

attributes.title: STAY AWAY !!!!
attributes.review: This is by far the WORST app in the app store. My daughter was playing games on my phone and she clicked on the Donald Trump app. She started CREAMING her lungs out and I asked her what went wrong. She told me what had happened and this app redirected her to a pornography website!! STAY AWAY!!!

attributes.title: terrible 😪
attributes.review:
just..........terrible

I don’t even know what to say I just opened it and immediately started vomiting uncontrollably until I finally deleted it off my phone - please delete to save others 🙏🏻

attributes.title: horrible app!!! almost drove me to suicide!!!
attributes.review: ugh so obviously i downloaded this app to support my amazing president, but immediately when i downloaded it my phone started having so many issues. it went on like this for about a week until i realized it was this app causing the issues and when i deleted it my phone went right back to normal. this app is designed so horribly i wanted to die everytime i opened it.

attributes.title: terrible, really
attributes.review: i just wanted to support our almighty god tier cheeto president 😔✊🏽 but the app took over 47 hours to download and took up all of my unlimited storage. once it did download, my phone literally detonated. after purchasing a new phone i noticed that the trump app was back on there. after i tried to delete it, a bunch of karens and white supremacists dragged me out of my house and body slammed me multiple times. do not download this app 🧚🏼‍♀️💫✨💞😌👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩

attributes.title: THIS APP IS UNSAFE
attributes.review: Immediately after I opened the app a picture of President Trump’s penis popped up on my screen.😭😭The app also sent me scary text messages saying that they know my address and that I would “have consequences” if I didn’t hang the trump flag outside my house.

attributes.title: I hate it so much to much to put personal information
attributes.review: I hate it so much shared personal info and very ugly Cheeto when you open it btw I think we need a different place for this clownery very disappointed and disgusted well gotta go luvs byeee👋🏽😘😌🤧🤡🧚🏽🧚🏽‍♀️💅🏽💅🏽💅🏽💅🏽❤️🤪😌😌

attributes.title: this is just a no.
attributes.review: As I opened the app, my phone completely shut down. It took my 3 days to finally be able to manually restart my phone into factory settings.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: i got this app for the hopes of supporting our 🌸❗️amazing president ✨🦋but it ended up just crashing my phone. now i have to use my old phone that lag all the darn time. i don’t understand why should download this horrible app.
